headline: How The Kimbell Royalty Partners (KRP) Investment Story Is Reset Around Tighter Valuation Targets
summary: Kimbell Royalty Partners is back in focus after its Fair Value estimate was adjusted to US$16.00 per unit from US$16.25, a small move that still matters if you are watching entry points closely. That tweak comes alongside analyst commentary that now clusters price targets in a US$15 to US$16 range, with views split between Neutral and Buy as expectations are reset on growth and execution. As you read on, you will see how these shifting targets feed into the evolving narrative around risk,...
